metadata.feature_description: Search and retrieve site pages for URL management operations

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Access Site Pages Search via Page Picker

steps.action: Navigate to Settings > SEO > URL Management > TEST URL tab
steps.expected: TEST URL tab should be accessible with Page to Test dropdown
steps.actual: TEST URL tab opened successfully showing Page to Test dropdown with search functionality

steps.action: Click on Page to Test dropdown to open page picker
steps.expected: Page picker dropdown should open showing search box and list of all site pages
steps.actual: Page picker dropdown opened with search box placeholder 'Search pages..' and displayed all 43 site pages in a tree view

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Search pages by partial text match

steps.action: Type 'Test' in the search box to filter pages
steps.expected: Page list should filter to show only pages containing 'Test' in their name
steps.actual: Search filtered results from 43 to 41 pages, showing only pages with 'Test' in their name (e.g., HubSpot Forms Test, Workflow Test Page, URL Test Page, etc.)

steps.action: Select 'URL Test Page' from filtered results
steps.expected: Selected page should appear in the dropdown and enable Test URL button
steps.actual: URL Test Page was selected successfully, displayed in the dropdown, and Test URL button became enabled

observations: The Site Pages Search feature is implemented as a page picker component within the URL Management TEST URL tab
Search uses case-insensitive partial text matching as confirmed by code review (IndexOf with StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase)
The API endpoint GetSitePages returns all non-disabled pages and filters by search text
The page picker displays pages in a hierarchical tree view with expand/collapse functionality
